item.title: Trump tapped Kari Lake to run VOA. Then he dismantled it.
item.description: Lake had big plans to transform the outlet into a powerful “weapon” to fight an “information war.” Instead, the president has essentially shut it down...

item.title: Nita Lowey, first woman to chair House appropriations panel, dies at 87

item.title: Trump’s new Secret Service boss faces calls for agency overhaul
item.description: Sean Curran, the Secret Service’s new director, has guarded Trump for several years. He took over leadership of the protective agency on Jan. 20.
